page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content: We sent out a questionnaire to 500 houses in our area.From our questionnaire we found that two-thirds of the people who replied had not lived in Pelsall all their lives.One of the reasons for this is that the village of Pelsall has expanded over the last thiry years. We found that people had moved to the area gradually over this period. We also found that the people who had moved to the area came from very local places such as Bloxwich,Aldridge,Willenhall,Brownhill s and Walsall.Two people had come from Australia and one from Scotland but the vast majority came from the local places written above.All the people questioned except one said they liked living in Pelsall.So,we can conclude that Pelsall 1985 is a nice place to live. {
